attributes.action: uphold the law by rejecting and deporting all asylum seekers (without recourse to any appeal process) who have travelled over many safe countries to arrive in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Be fair and accountable to the law abiding British citizens by not wasting copious amounts of tax payer's money on matters not in the interests of society as a whole.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
